snippet: Gary M. Cohen, who oversees the health exchanges set up under the Affordable Care Act, has been a punching bag for Republicans and has been chided even by some Democrats.
abstract: Center for Consumer Information and Insurance Oversight director Gary M Cohen, who oversees health exchanges set up under Affordable Care Act, is at center of furor over health care law; Cohen has been punching bag for Republicans in Congress, while even some Democrats have chided him, saying he needs to speed up work on exchanges so people could sign up for coverage.
lead_paragraph: Gary M. Cohen, who oversees the health exchanges set up under the Affordable Care Act, has been a punching bag for Republicans and has been chided even by some Democrats.

headline.main: Federal Official at Center of the Health Care Tumult Has Gone Against the Grain
headline.print_headline: Federal Official at Center of the Health Care Tumult Has Gone Against the Grain
